alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 18 at 8:25AM CDT until March 18 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...EAST CENTRAL PERRY...SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE AND NORTHERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 824 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Clara to 9 miles east of Richton to Beaumont, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chatom, Saint Stephens, Millry, State Line, Buckatunna and Fruitdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
